jdw.graphics
Class Primitive

java.lang.Object
  jdw.graphics.Primitive

public class Primitive
extends Object

Primitives are objects that can be placed into an Environment3D. Positions of objects are based on a left-handed coordinate system.

Constructor Summary
Primitive(RenderMode rm)
          Creates a new Primitive with a user specified render mode.

Constructor Detail

Primitive

public Primitive(RenderMode rm)
Creates a new Primitive with a user specified render mode.

Parameters:
rm - the render mode specifiying how the vertices of the primitive should be interpreted
See Also:
RenderMode
Method Detail

setTransform

public void setTransform(Matrix m)
Sets the transformation matrix for this primitive. This method can be used to manipulate the positions of individual primtives.

Parameters:
m - the matrix to be used as this primitive's transformation, or null for no transformation

getTransform

public Matrix getTransform()
Returns the current primitive transformation matrix. If no transformation is being used (e.g. null was passed to setTransform) the returned matrix is the identity matrix.

Returns:
the current primitive transformation matrix

addVertex

public void addVertex(Vertex vertex)
Adds a vertex to this primitive. The Vertex object data is copied into this primitive.

Parameters:
vertex - the vertex to add
Throws:
NullPointerException - if vertex was null

getRenderMode

public RenderMode getRenderMode()
Returns the render mode i.e. how edges are calculated during the rendering process.

Returns:
the render mode

getMaterial

public Material getMaterial()
Returns the current Material.

Returns:
the current material

setMaterial

public void setMaterial(Material m)
Sets the current Material.

Parameters:
m - the new material

setColored

public void setColored(boolean c)
Sets whether the vertices of this primitive should be colored according to the vertex colors. It may be the case that some or all of the vertices of this primitive have a null color specified. In this case the color black is used. The default value for this property is true.

isColored

public boolean isColored()
Returns whether the vertices of this primitive are colored according to the vertex colors.

setTexture

public void setTexture(Texture t)
The texture/skin to use for this primitive, or null if no texture is required.

getTexture

public Texture getTexture()
Returns the current texture, or null if no texture is in use.

createTriangle

public static Primitive createTriangle()
Creates a triangle with width 1, centered around the origin.

createCube

public static Primitive createCube()
Creates a cube with side length 1, centered around the origin.
